Hippie Bagpacker is an Android APP developed by Harinder Pal Singh (218565023), for submission of Assesment 3 Unit SIT 708 Mobile System Development.
 
 This app has 4 main features which are as follows:

 1. Find tourist locations near you and explore them in Panoramic view.

 2. Explore Itineraries added by other Users.

3. Upload your own Itineraries to firebase (Realtime-database).

 4. Find packing Items according to your destination type.
